name: My Little Assassin
description:
You've been hired by the Mafia to kill whomever they ask... can you please them?

In this game, you take control of a tiny robot. Your goal is to grab and assemble the different types of toxic molecules in the correct order, increasing your poison's toxicity. If your poison is toxic enough, you will be successful in killing your victims. If not...

Notes: 

- When attaching molecules, the one that is not being held will follow the one being held.

- To clear a chain of molecules, you must clear the last molecule  in the chain.

- This game feels better to play with a controller.
